title: Fotm people are the worst
body: You know what I mean that person who takes advantage of Riots lack of knowledge regarding its own game and plays that one champ that is balls to the wall broken for a patch or two then acts like they are some godlike player. At the moment its Mundo, so many Mundos who think they are some sort of Mundo god because they have 5k health tons of resist and healing and hit E for hundreds of free AD not to mention his Q dmg and cd. I don't mind people abusing freelo its just the ones that do it then act like they are on their way to the LCS or something.
